TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintJobStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the current status of a print job in a print queue.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used primarily as the value of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo.JobStatus%2A> property.
## Examples The following example shows how to use this enumeration when diagnosing a problem with a print job.
[!code-cs[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#SpotTroubleUsingJobAttributes](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob/Program.cs#spottroubleusingjobattributes)] [!code-cpp[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#SpotTroubleUsingJobAttributes](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/diagnoseproblematicprintjob/Program.cpp#spottroubleusingjobattributes)] [!code-vb[DiagnoseProblematicPrintJob#SpotTroubleUsingJobAttributes](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/diagnoseproblematicprintjob/program.vb#spottroubleusingjobattributes)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus Blocked = int32(512)

Docs.summary: An error condition, possibly on a print job that precedes this one in the queue, blocked the print job.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus Completed = int32(4096)

Docs.summary: The print job is complete, including any post-printing processing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus Deleted = int32(256)

Docs.summary: The print job was deleted from the queue, typically after printing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus Deleting = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The print job is in the process of being deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus Error = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The print job is in an error state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The print job has no specified state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus Offline = int32(32)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus PaperOut = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The printer is out of the required paper size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus Paused = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus Printed = int32(128)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus Printing = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The print job is now printing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus Restarted = int32(2048)

Docs.summary: The print job was blocked but has restarted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus Retained = int32(8192)

Docs.summary: The print job is retained in the print queue after printing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus Spooling = int32(8)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintJobStatus UserIntervention = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: The printer requires user action to fix an error condition.
